Package org.middleheaven.global

Global Toolbox Definition of Culture (similar to java.util.Locale) and CultureModel for definition of number and text formatting The global package is a wrapper around the java.text package for formatting but provided additional value like the Atlas Toolbox and the Address Toolbox

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IsoCode  
LocalizationService Localization Service.
 

Class Summary
CountryIsoCode Represents a country code in the ISO standard.
Culture Representation of a culture.
Language Flyweight implementation for Language
StringIsoCode  
 

Package org.middleheaven.global Description

Global Toolbox Definition of Culture (similar to java.util.Locale) and CultureModel for definition of number and text formatting The global package is a wrapper around the java.text package for formatting but provided additional value like the Atlas Toolbox and the Address Toolbox
